intro: Matelea longiflora, commonly known as the long-flowered matelea, is a species of flowering plant native to the tropical regions of Central and South America. Matelea longiflora is a climbing shrub that produces capsule fruits containing numerous small, smooth seeds. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in forest understories.
